source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_00<tab>Fray has been watching you, and <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is not pleased with your progress.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_00<tab>Fray ne semble pas satisfait de vos progrès.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_01<tab>The voice is waiting to be heard, yet you cannot seem to grasp it on your own. Though disappointed, Fray will help you to understand its intent. Only communion will suffice. Moraby Drydocks will be where you conduct the rites next.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_01<tab>Fray était déçu que vous n'ayez pas entendu la voix depuis votre dernière rencontre. Il pense que vous ne mettez pas assez en pratique ses en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments... Allez le retrouver au chantier naval de Moraby pour communier une nouvelle fois.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_02<tab>Where do these people come from!? These helpless, hopeless weaklings who see fit to beg the assistance of every passing adventurer. And now comes another, beseeching the Warrior of Light to recover some stolen chest or crate of only the gods know what! The merchant claims the Qiqirn bandits and their leader will prove worthy prey, but we have been disappointed before...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_02<tab>Alors que Fray vous contait un épisode de son passé, vous avez été interrompus par un marchand qui s'est fait voler sa cargaison par des Qiqirns. Comme toujours, vous n'avez pas d'autre choix que de rendre service... Partez retrouver Fray aux atolls de sel.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_03<tab>All around you lay the remains of Qiqirn, hacked to pieces, some beyond recognition. Chest heaving with exertion, you gaze at the bloodstained sword in your hands, uncertain how long you have held it. The pounding in your head intensifies, and you blink back the pain. Fray... Where is Fray...?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_03<tab>Fray et vous avez massacré les pauvres Qiqirns pour reprendre les mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses volées. Parlez à votre mentor pour savoir ce qu'il a pensé de ce combat.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_04<tab>Fray looks how you feel─utterly spent and in need of a rest. “Finish it,” <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> says. “Finish what we started...”
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_04<tab>Fray vous a demandé de partir devant. Retournez au chantier naval de Moraby et trouvez le marchand pour lui remettre son bien.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_05<tab>Madness! Utter madness! That spineless sack of shite actually demanded compensation for his property! The nerve of these people, after all we do for them! But Fray was not about to let that pass, oh no! It was a thing of glory, Fray giving voice to our feelings. Our words tumbling from Fray's mouth. But why did <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> have to leave? Where could <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> have gone?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_05<tab>Lorsque vous lui avez rendu son bien, le marchand s'est montré fort désagréable. Au lieu de vous remercier, il a exigé une compensation pour le sang qui recouvrait sa caisse de mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses<var 1D /var>! Hors de lui, Fray ne s'est pas gêné pour lui dire sa façon de penser. Allez maintenant à la recherche de votre mentor, qui est parti un peu plus loin.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_06<tab>Fray fears for us. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> knows we cannot go on like this. The voice...we must hearken to the voice...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_06<tab>Fray, qui semble avoir peu d'estime pour les gens que vous aidez au quotidien, vous a dit que vous étiez proche de saisir le sens de la voix et de comprendre le sens de votre mission de chevalier noir. Fermez les yeux, respirez pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment, concentrez-vous et entrez en communion avec lui.

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_07Fray is right, of course. Fray has always been right. Only when we have renounced everything are we free to do anything. We can leave it behind─all of it. The Scions. The Alliance. Even Hydaelyn. All we have to do is ask, and shall set us free.

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Fray upon reaching level 50.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SEQ_07Une fois de plus, la voix vous a parlé pendant le rituel. Et comme toujours, vous n'avez pas saisi le sens de ses paroles. Fray aimerait vous en dire plus, mais il ne peut que vous guider... Il a cependant évoqué la possibilité d'abandonner tout ce que vous connaissez pour être libéré. Prenez le temps de réfléchir à cette éventualité et retrouvez votre mentor à l'endroit habituel, quand vous serez prêt.
* Fray propose la prochaine quête aux chevaliers noirs de niveau 50.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Fray at the Moraby Drydocks.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_TODO_00<tab>Retrouver Fray au chantier naval de Moraby

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Fray on the Salt Strand.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Fray, aux atolls de sel

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Fray.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_TODO_02<tab>Parler à Fray

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_TODO_03<tab>Return the stolen merchandise.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_TODO_03<tab>Apporter les mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses volées au marchand

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_000<tab>...I'm beginning to question your commitment, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_000<tab>... Je commence à douter de ta motivation, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_001<tab>You haven't heard the voice since our last communion, which means you haven't taken my lessons to heart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_001<tab>Tu n'as pas entendu la voix depuis notre dernière Communion, ce qui veut dire que tu n'as pas suivi mes conseils.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_002<tab>You know I'm trying to help you, don't you? All of this is for <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> benefit.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_002<tab>Tu as conscience que j'essaye de t'aider, j'espère<var 1D /var>? Tout ce que je fais, c'est pour <var 1A 02 /var>ton<var 1A 01 /var> bien.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_003<tab>You listen, but you don't <var 1A 02 /var>understand<var 1A 01 /var>─
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_003<tab>Tu écoutes, mais tu ne <var 1A 02 /var>comprends<var 1A 01 /var> pas.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_004<tab>...Never mind.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_004<tab>... Ce n'est rien.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_005<tab>You're the stubborn type. I know that. We'll just have to keep at it until you open your eyes.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_005<tab>Tu es du genre obstiné, hein<var 1D /var>? Ça ne fait rien, nous allons persévérer jusqu'à ce que tu ouvres les yeux.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_006<tab>Moraby Drydocks. That's where we'll head next.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_006<tab>Viens me trouver au chantier naval de Moraby.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_010<tab>...Never much cared for the ocean, myself.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_010<tab>... Ça ne m'a jamais fait grand-chose de voir la mer.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_011<tab>That friend of mine─the one I told you about after our first communion. We came out here together, once.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_011<tab><var 08 E905 ((Cette amie)) ((Cet ami)) /var> dont je t'ai parlé après notre première Communion... Je suis déjà venu ici avec <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((lui)) /var>, par le passé.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_012<tab>Long story short, we ended up doing something ridiculously foolish and were lucky to make it out alive.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_012<tab>Sans entrer dans les détails, on a fait quelque chose de com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment insensé, et on a eu beaucoup de chance d'en sortir vivants...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_013<tab>I tried to talk <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> out of it, but <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> just had to get on that damn boat...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_013<tab>J'avais essayé de l'en dissuader, mais <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> voulait monter à bord de ce bateau coûte que coûte...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_014<tab>(-???-)Don't be like that, friend! Isn't the Maelstrom supposed to aid the smallfolk when they're in a spot of trouble?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_014<tab>(-???-)Je ne comprends pas<var 1D /var>! Vous autres du Maelstrom n'êtes pas censés venir en aide aux petites gens en cas de problème<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_015<tab>So far as it is possible, yes, but...such matters fall within the purview of the Yellowjackets, and─
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_015<tab>Dans la mesure du possible, oui, mais... ce type d'affaire est du ressort des casaques jaunes, et...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_016<tab>And they told me to bugger off─can you believe that!? I'm begging you, Sergeant!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_016<tab>Oui, et pourtant je me suis fait envoyer sur les roses quand j'ai demandé leur aide<var 1D /var>! Je vous en prie, Sergent...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_017<tab>I... Wait. Is that you, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) /var>)) /var>?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_017<tab>Attendez... C'est vous, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaFemaleText)) E93501 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaFemaleText)) E93601 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahFemaleText)) E93701 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_018<tab>It is! The legend <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>! Forgive me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I never thanked you properly for your service to Limsa Lominsa. When I first heard Leviathan had been summoned, I feared that─
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_018<tab>Mais oui<var 1D /var>! La légende, en chair et en os<var 1D /var>! Pardonnez-moi, je n'ai jamais pu vous remercier comme il se doit pour les services que vous avez rendus à Limsa Lominsa. Quand j'ai entendu que Léviathan avait été invoqué, j'ai cru que...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_019<tab>Why, if it isn't that famous adventurer who's been killing primals left and right!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_019<tab>Vous voulez dire que c'est <var 08 E905 ((la célèbre aventurière)) ((le célèbre aventurier)) /var> qui a vaincu tous ces Primordiaux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_020<tab>Truly, the Twelve must be watching over me, because you're just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> I need!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_020<tab>Quelle chance<var 1D /var>! Loués soient les Douze, vous êtes exactement la personne qu'il me faut<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_021<tab><sniffle> <sob> I...I am the victim of a terrible─nay, <var 1A 02 /var>heinous<var 1A 01 /var> crime! I was waylaid by Qiqirn bandits near the Salt Strand, who left me with naught more than the clothes on my back!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_021<tab>(sanglote) J'ai été victime d'un crime <var 1A 02 /var>atroce<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>! Des bandits qiqirns m'ont attaqué près des atolls de sel et ils m'ont tout volé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_022<tab>...And what makes you think I give a Qiqirn's arse about your troubles? Go and bother the Yellowjackets, like the sergeant said.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_022<tab>... Qu'est-ce qui te fait croire que tes démêlés avec les Qiqirns nous intéressent<var 1D /var>? Va te plaindre aux casaques jaunes, comme le sergent l'a dit.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_023<tab>I seek worthy prey, not a gang of rats.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_023<tab>Nous cherchons des adversaires dignes de ce nom, pas une bande de rats pelés.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_024<tab>How can you say such a thing, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!? Without your help, I'm ruined!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_024<tab>Comment pouvez-vous dire une chose pareille<var 1D /var>!? Sans votre aide, je suis ruiné<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_Q1_000_025<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_Q1_000_025<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A1_000_026<tab>Fine, I'll help.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A1_000_026<tab>Très bien, je vais vous aider.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A1_000_027<tab>Not my problem.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A1_000_027<tab>Ça n'est pas mon problème.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_030<tab>Spoken like a true hero!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_030<tab>Vous faites honneur à votre réputation<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_031<tab>So you know, the rank and file didn't seem so dangerous, but their leader was a mean-looking bastard...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_031<tab>Je préfère vous mettre en garde. Le gros de la troupe n'avait pas l'air bien dangereux, mais leur chef était d'un tout autre gabarit...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_032<tab>But considering the foes you've faced in the past, he couldn't possibly pose a threat to you!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_032<tab>Enfin, au vu des ennemis que vous avez vaincus par le passé, cela ne devrait pas vous poser le moindre problème<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_035<tab>W-Wait, just listen! You said you wanted worthy prey, yes!?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_035<tab>A-attendez, écoutez-moi<var 1D /var>! Vous m'avez dit être à la recherche d'adversaires à la hauteur, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_036<tab>Their leader was a mean-looking bastard, at least two or three times the size of the others. It'd probably take a dozen men to bring him down!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_036<tab>Le chef de la bande de Qiqirns était gros comme une montagne<var 1D /var>! Il faudrait sûrement une douzaine d'hommes pour en venir à bout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_037<tab>If it's a challenge you want, then there it is! Just you against him and his cronies! What say you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_037<tab>Si vous voulez un défi à la mesure de votre talent, ne cherchez pas plus loin<var 1D /var>! Vous seul<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> contre cette brute et tous ses petits copains, qu'en dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_040<tab>Shut your mouth and wait here. I'll be back.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_040<tab>Ferme ton clapet et attends-nous ici, compris<var 1D /var>? Ça ne sera pas long.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_050<tab>You really don't have to do this, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_050<tab>Vous n'êtes pas obligé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> d'y aller, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaFemaleText)) E93501 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaFemaleText)) E93601 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahFemaleText)) E93701 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_055<tab>You'll find them on the Salt Strand, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. That's where they made camp. Only mind their leader, eh? He's a mean-looking bastard, that one.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_055<tab>Je pense que vous trouverez leur campement aux atolls de sel, au sud-ouest d'ici. Attention à leur chef, il n'avait vraiment pas l'air commode<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_060<tab>If this Qiqirn isn't everything he promised, I'll take it out of his hide...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_060<tab>Si ce champion qiqirn n'est pas comme le marchand nous l'a décrit, je jure que je...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_061<tab>Let's make the most of this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. No style, no guile, just chaos. Mark your limits, then push yourself beyond. Let the darkness guide you and set you free.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_061<tab>Bon, voilà ce qu'on va faire. Pas de ruse, pas d'artifices, juste force brute et destruction. Tu connais tes limites... alors dépasse-les. Laisse-toi gagner par les ténèbres et libère-toi.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_070<tab>Heh...heh... You did well...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_070<tab>Ha... Ha... Tu t'es bien battu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_071<tab>All that's left...is to return the goods to their owner...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_071<tab>Il ne nous reste plus... qu'à restituer ses possessions au marchand...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_072<tab>...Finish it... Finish what we started...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_072<tab>... Finis... ce qu'on a commencé...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_080<tab>The hard part is over... Now finish it...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_080<tab>Nous avons fait le plus dur... Finis le travail...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_090<tab>Ah, it's you! Were you able to catch up with those bandits?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_090<tab>Ah, c'est vous<var 1D /var>! Alors, vous avez pu retrouver ces bandits<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_091<tab>Er, yes...that seems to be mine, but...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_091<tab>Oui, c'est bien ma caisse, mais...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_092<tab>...Llymlaen take me, I can't sell this!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_092<tab>... Par Llymlaen, mes mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses sont com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment invendables<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_093<tab>Everything's soaked through with Qiqirn blood! What did you do─carve one open and leave him to bleed all over my wares!?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_093<tab>Vous ne voyez pas que tout est couvert de sang de Qiqirn<var 1D /var>? Vous en avez égorgé un dessus, ou quoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_094<tab>I'm ruined...utterly ruined.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_094<tab>Cette fois, c'est sûr, je suis ruiné...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_095<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>, I demand recompense for your reckless destruction of my property!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_095<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var>, j'exige que vous me dédommagiez pour le manque à gagner<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_096<tab>I am a reasonable man, so I will acknowledge that you are not wholly responsible. Fifty percent of the value should suffice.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_096<tab>Comme je suis raisonnable, j'admets que vous n'êtes pas totalement responsable. La moitié de la valeur totale suffira.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_097<tab>Fifty percent? FIFTY PERCENT!?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_097<tab>La moitié<var 1D /var>? LA MOITIÉ<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_098<tab>I slaughter a gang of Qiqirn bandits for your precious goods and this is the thanks I receive!?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_098<tab>On massacre un gang entier de bandits qiqirns pour récupérer tes mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses et c'est comme ça que tu nous remercies<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_099<tab>You spineless sack of shite. I kill your enemies. I fetch your things. I do what you people can't or won't do yourselves.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_099<tab>Misérable petite fiente... On te débarrasse de tes ennemis, on va te chercher tes affaires... Sans nous, qu'aurais-tu fait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_100<tab>You're helpless. Weak. All you do is want and need.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_100<tab>Tu es faible, sans défense... Ton in<var 16 /var>si<var 16 /var>gni<var 16 /var>fiante existence se résume à compter sur les autres.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_101<tab>I should've left you all to drown in Leviathan's tidal wave. At least then I would've been spared your <var 1A 02 /var>constant<var 1A 01 /var> bloody whining.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_101<tab>Nous aurions dû vous laisser vous noyer dans le raz-de-marée provoqué par Léviathan. Au moins, on n'aurait pas eu à écouter ces inepties...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_102<tab>Do not speak to me of this ever again.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_102<tab>Surtout, ne t'avise plus jamais de me parler sur ce ton.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_103<tab>P-Pray forgive me my insolence, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_103<tab>Je vous en prie, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var>, pardonnez mon insolence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_104<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) /var>)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I... You have every right to be upset, but...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_104<tab><var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaFemaleText)) E93501 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaFemaleText)) E93601 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahFemaleText)) E93701 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, je peux comprendre que vous soyez en colère, mais...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_105<tab>...I think he understands, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_105<tab>... Je pense qu'il a compris, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaFemaleText)) E93501 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaFemaleText)) E93601 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahFemaleText)) E93701 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_110<tab>Never again, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! I promise!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_MERCHANT02057_000_110<tab>Cela n'arrivera plus, je vous le promets<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_115<tab>Honestly, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I...I don't think you had to...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_STYRNLONA_000_115<tab>Était-il nécessaire d'aller si loin, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaFemaleText)) E93501 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaFemaleText)) E93601 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 08 E905 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahFemaleText)) E93701 /var>)) ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_110<tab>We can't keep doing this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You must see now what it's doing to us... What they're doing to us...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_110<tab>Ça ne peut pas continuer comme ça, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_100_110<tab>These...these <var 1A 02 /var>people<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_100_110<tab>Ces... ces <var 1A 02 /var>gens<var 1A 01 /var>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_Q2_000_111<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_Q2_000_111<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A2_000_112<tab>Never mind them. The voice is all that matters.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A2_000_112<tab>Peu importe. Seule la voix compte pour moi.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A2_000_113<tab>We don't need them to become a dark knight.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A2_000_113<tab>Je n'ai pas besoin d'eux pour être un chevalier noir.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A2_000_114<tab>He deserved it. Every word.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_A2_000_114<tab>Il l'a bien mérité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_120<tab>Yes...yes, you are right. You must hearken to its words and discover your true calling.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_120<tab>Oui, tu as raison. Tu dois tendre l'oreille, écouter chacun de ses mots pour découvrir ta vocation.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_121<tab>You are close, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─so very, very close...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_121<tab>Tu es proche, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Si proche...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_122<tab>I wish I could tell you. I wish I could <var 1A 02 /var>make<var 1A 01 /var> you see.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_122<tab>J'aimerais tout t'expliquer. J'aimerais te montrer...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_123<tab>But all I can do is guide you on your journey...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_123<tab>Mais tout ce que je peux faire, c'est te guider sur la voie...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_125<tab>Not entirely true, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. They have helped you to cultivate the darkness within, in a way. But their help is no longer needed.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_125<tab>C'est faux, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Dans un certain sens, ils te servent à développer ton côté obscur. Mais tu n'as plus besoin d'eux, maintenant.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_126<tab>All that remains is to hearken to the voice─to grasp its words and discover your true calling.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_126<tab>Il te suffit désormais d'écouter at<var 16 /var>ten<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment la voix, de comprendre le sens de ses mots pour découvrir ta vocation.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_127<tab>I wish I could tell you. I wish I could <var 1A 02 /var>make<var 1A 01 /var> you see.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_127<tab>J'aimerais tout t'expliquer. J'aimerais te montrer...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_128<tab>But all I can do is guide you on your journey...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_128<tab>Mais tout ce que je peux faire, c'est te guider sur la voie...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_130<tab>Hah...hahaha! Right you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Right you are!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_130<tab>Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! Tu as bien raison, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_131<tab>Felt good, didn't it? Seeing that sniveling wretch tremble. I think he nearly pissed himself!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_131<tab>Ça m'a fait du bien<var 1D /var>! Ce pleutre tremblait tellement que j'ai cru qu'il allait se faire dessus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_132<tab>You're finally starting to see them for what they are now, aren't you? Good, good.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_132<tab>Je vois que tu commences enfin à les voir tels qu'ils sont. C'est bien.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_133<tab>All that remains is to hearken to the voice─to grasp its words and discover your true calling...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_133<tab>Il te suffit désormais d'écouter at<var 16 /var>ten<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment la voix, de comprendre le sens de ses mots pour découvrir ta vocation.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>With every breath you grow lighter and slip further into the abyss...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>Chaque respiration vous rend plus <var 08 E905 ((légère)) ((léger)) /var> et vous fait glisser peu à peu dans les ténèbres...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_141<tab>(-???-)A chorus of voices cries out for a hero, and <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> comes.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_141<tab>(-???-)La foule se rassemble pour acclamer son <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_142<tab>(-???-)<var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> smiles. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> nods. And <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> remains silent...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_142<tab>(-???-)<var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> sourit, <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> acquiesce, et <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> reste silencieu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((x)) /var>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_143<tab>(-???-)But <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> too has a voice...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_143<tab>(-???-)Mais <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> a une voix, <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((lui)) /var> aussi...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_144<tab>(-???-)I will be heard...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_144<tab>(-???-)Un jour, je me ferai entendre...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_145<tab>...<var 29 EB02 /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_145<tab>... <var 29 EB02 /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_146<tab>...You stand at the precipice, but do not fear the fall.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_146<tab>... Tu es au bord du précipice, mais tu ne dois pas craindre la chute.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_147<tab>Cast yourself into the abyss, and you shall soar above, free at last.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_147<tab>Il te suffirait de te jeter dans les abysses pour mieux t'élever vers les cieux, enfin libre.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_148<tab>There are other lands than these, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─lands where we are not known. Ask, and we shall quit this place forever.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_148<tab>Il existe d'autres terres, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Des contrées où personne ne te connaît. Si c'est ce que tu désires, nous pouvons quitter cet endroit à tout jamais.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_149<tab>Only when you have renounced everything are you free to do anything.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_149<tab>Ce n'est qu'en renonçant à ce que tu es que tu seras com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment libéré<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_150<tab>When we meet again, you will give us your answer.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_000_150<tab>Quand nous nous reverrons, tu me donneras ta réponse.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Slaughter the Qiqirn!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Massacrez les Qiqirns<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Retrieve the stolen goods!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Reprenez les mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses volées<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Weak...but plentiful. They may yet suffice...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Faibles... mais nombreux. Débarrassons-nous d'eux.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_03<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_03<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_BOSS_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Yoyoroon not afraid! Yoyoroon kill you and loot your loots!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_BOSS_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Yoyoroon pas peur<var 1D /var>! Yoyoroon vous tuer et voler tous vos trésors<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Heh...heh... Tenacious bastards... Right, then. The goods.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Hé hé... Tenace, le bougre. Bon, les mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses, maintenant.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_05<tab>Good. There's nothing left here for...for...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_05<tab>Bien, on dirait que tout y est.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Not now, dammit! Not when we're so close!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK450_02057_FRAY_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Si près du but...<var 1D /var>!
